collection_info.name: geographic_spatial_queries
collection_info.description: High-quality geographic and spatial query patterns for FloatChat Indian Ocean ARGO system
collection_info.interface_type: Conversational chatbot with interactive map dashboard

queries.content: Find all ARGO floats within a 200km radius of 10°N, 75°E. Which floats are currently operating near this specific point? Show me active floats in this vicinity.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT f.float_id, f.last_latitude, f.last_longitude, f.current_status, (6371 * ACOS(COS(RADIANS({target_lat})) * COS(RADIANS(f.last_latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(f.last_longitude) - RADIANS({target_lon})) + SIN(RADIANS({target_lat})) * SIN(RADIANS(f.last_latitude)))) AS distance_km FROM floats f WHERE f.last_latitude IS NOT NULL AND f.last_longitude IS NOT NULL HAVING distance_km <= {search_radius} ORDER BY distance_km ASC
natural_language_patterns: Find floats within {search_radius}km of {target_lat}°N, {target_lon}°E
Show active floats near {target_lat}, {target_lon}
Which floats are in the vicinity of these coordinates?
conversation_followups: Show the most recent profile from the closest float.
What are the temperature and salinity readings from these floats?
Have any of these floats reported data in the last 30 days?
metadata.indian_ocean_context: High relevance for specific point analysis in any basin.

queries.content: Retrieve all temperature and salinity measurements within the Arabian Sea, defined by the coordinates 45°E to 75°E and 8°N to 25°N. What data is available in this specific rectangular area?

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.temperature, m.salinity FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.latitude BETWEEN {lat_min} AND {lat_max} AND p.longitude BETWEEN {lon_min} AND {lon_max} AND m.temperature IS NOT NULL AND m.salinity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.profile_date DESC
natural_language_patterns: Get data within the box {lat_min}-{lat_max}°N, {lon_min}-{lon_max}°E
Show measurements in the Arabian Sea region.
What data is available in this rectangular area?
conversation_followups: What is the average temperature in this region?
Show me a T-S diagram for this dataset.
How does the data density change over time in this box?
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Core query for regional oceanographic analysis.

queries.content: Display the full trajectory of float 2902182 from its deployment to its last known location. How has this float moved over time? Plot the path of this ARGO float.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.profile_date, p.latitude, p.longitude, p.cycle_number FROM profiles p WHERE p.float_id = {float_id} ORDER BY p.profile_date ASC
natural_language_patterns: Show the trajectory of float {float_id}
Plot the path of float {float_id}
How has float {float_id} moved over time?
conversation_followups: What was the average speed of this float?
Did the float cross any major ocean currents?
Show the temperature profile at the start and end of its journey.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Fundamental for understanding float movement and data coverage.

queries.content: Compare the latest vertical temperature profiles from a float in the Bay of Bengal (around 15°N, 90°E) and one in the Mozambique Channel (around 15°S, 40°E).

metadata.sql_template: (SELECT p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.temperature FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.profile_id = (SELECT profile_id FROM profiles WHERE latitude BETWEEN 14 AND 16 AND longitude BETWEEN 89 AND 91 ORDER BY profile_date DESC LIMIT 1)) UNION ALL (SELECT p.latitude, p.longitude, m.pressure, m.temperature FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.profile_id = (SELECT profile_id FROM profiles WHERE latitude BETWEEN -16 AND -14 AND longitude BETWEEN 39 AND 41 ORDER BY profile_date DESC LIMIT 1))
natural_language_patterns: Compare profiles from Bay of Bengal and Mozambique Channel.
Show temperature differences between two locations.
Contrast the vertical structure at two distinct points.
conversation_followups: What could explain the differences in the thermocline depth?
Are these differences typical for these regions?
Show the salinity profiles for the same locations.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Crucial for understanding large-scale oceanographic gradients.

queries.content: Show the sea surface temperature along a transect from 5°N, 80°E to 5°N, 95°E. What are the temperature variations along this specific line of longitude?

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.longitude, m.temperature FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.latitude BETWEEN 4.5 AND 5.5 AND p.longitude BETWEEN 80 AND 95 AND m.pressure < 10 ORDER BY p.longitude ASC
natural_language_patterns: Show surface temperature along the 5°N transect.
Plot temperature variations along a line from 80°E to 95°E.
Get data along a specific oceanographic transect.
conversation_followups: Is there an ocean front visible in this transect?
How does this compare to the salinity along the same line?
Show the same transect at a depth of 100 meters.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Important for studying ocean fronts and eddies.

queries.content: Which floats have transmitted data from the Andaman Sea in the last year? List all floats that have been active in this specific geographical area recently.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT DISTINCT p.float_id, f.last_update, f.last_latitude, f.last_longitude FROM profiles p JOIN floats f ON p.float_id = f.float_id WHERE p.latitude BETWEEN 5 AND 15 AND p.longitude BETWEEN 92 AND 98 AND p.profile_date >= DATE('now', '-1 year') ORDER BY f.last_update DESC
natural_language_patterns: Which floats were in the Andaman Sea last year?
List active floats in the Andaman Sea.
Show floats that recently reported from the Andaman Sea.
conversation_followups: Show the trajectories of these floats.
What is the data coverage like in this region?
Compare the data from two of these floats.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Useful for monitoring specific, named ocean basins.

queries.content: What is the closest active ARGO float to the coast of Somalia (e.g., 10°N, 51°E)? And show me its latest data.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT f.float_id, f.last_latitude, f.last_longitude, (6371 * ACOS(COS(RADIANS(10)) * COS(RADIANS(f.last_latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(f.last_longitude) - RADIANS(51)) + SIN(RADIANS(10)) * SIN(RADIANS(f.last_latitude)))) AS distance_km FROM floats f WHERE f.current_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY distance_km ASC LIMIT 1
natural_language_patterns: Find the nearest active float to the Somali coast.
Closest float to 10°N, 51°E.
Which operational float is nearest to this point?
conversation_followups: How far away is it?
When was its last transmission?
Show its trajectory over the last 6 months.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Relevant for piracy monitoring and coastal dynamics.

queries.content: Generate a map of the sea surface temperature for the entire Indian Ocean for the last 30 days. Show me the current surface temperature distribution.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.latitude, p.longitude, m.temperature FROM profiles p JOIN measurements m ON p.profile_id = m.profile_id WHERE p.profile_date >= DATE('now', '-30 days') AND m.pressure < 10 AND m.temperature_qc = 1
natural_language_patterns: Map of recent sea surface temperature in the Indian Ocean.
Show the current surface temperature distribution.
Generate a sea surface temperature map for the last month.
conversation_followups: Where are the warmest and coldest spots?
Can you animate this for the last 12 months?
Overlay the major ocean currents on this map.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: A fundamental visualization for understanding ocean climate.

queries.content: Show me a map of all the deployment locations of the ARGO floats in the database. Where were all the floats initially deployed?

metadata.sql_template: SELECT float_id, deployment_latitude, deployment_longitude, deployment_date, program_name FROM floats
natural_language_patterns: Map of float deployment locations.
Where were the floats initially deployed?
Show the starting points of all floats.
conversation_followups: Are there any patterns in the deployment locations?
Which program deployed the most floats?
Show the trajectories of floats from a specific deployment region.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Provides context on the spatial distribution of the observation network's origins.

queries.content: Have any floats crossed the equator? Identify all ARGO floats that have profiles both in the Northern and Southern Hemispheres.

metadata.sql_template: SELECT p.float_id FROM profiles p GROUP BY p.float_id HAVING MIN(p.latitude) < 0 AND MAX(p.latitude) > 0
natural_language_patterns: Which floats have crossed the equator?
Show floats with data in both hemispheres.
Identify cross-equatorial floats.
conversation_followups: Plot the full trajectories of these floats.
When and where did they cross the equator?
Compare the water properties before and after crossing.
metadata.indian_ocean_context: Interesting for studying cross-equatorial transport and dynamics.
